name: Grand River Hospital to Waterloo Regional Health Network (WHRN)
comment:
General hospital with approximately 680 hospital beds and two main campuses

Services include:
  • acute care
  • cancer care
  • complex care
  • children's and childbirth care
  • mental health services
  • rehabilitation
  • emergency care
  • surgery
  • outpatient services
  • satellite community clinics

Formerly known as Grand River Hospital, now a network of all three Kitchener-Waterloo hospitals

Services and Programs:
  • Freeport Health Centre
  • Renal Clinic - Guelph Site
  • Renal Clinic - Palmerston Site
  • WHRN at Queen’s Boulevard

Grand River Hospital to Waterloo Regional Health Network (WHRN)
